property.name: sqlite_engine
property.description: Sqlite Database backend to use

property.name: sqlite_nice_name
property.description: Name to show in the UI.

property.name: sqlite_name
property.description: For SQLite, name defines the path to the database

property.name: sqlite_options
property.description: Database options to send to the server when connecting.

property.name: mysql_engine
property.description: MySQL Database backend to use

property.name: mysql_nice_name
property.description: Name to show in the UI.

property.name: mysql_name
property.description: For MySQL, name is the name of the database

property.name: mysql_host
property.description: IP or hostname of the database to connect to

property.name: mysql_port
property.description: Port the database server is listening to

property.name: mysql_user
property.description: Password matching the username to authenticate with when connecting to the database

property.name: mysql_password
property.description: Password matching the username to authenticate with when connecting to the database

property.name: mysql_options
property.description: Database options to send to the server when connecting.

property.name: postgresql_engine
property.description: PostgreSQL Database backend to use

property.name: postgresql_nice_name
property.description: Name to show in the UI.

property.name: postgresql_name
property.description: For PostgreSQL, name is the name of the database

property.name: postgresql_host
property.description: IP or hostname of the database to connect to

property.name: postgresql_port
property.description: Port the database server is listening to

property.name: postgresql_user
property.description: Password matching the username to authenticate with when connecting to the database

property.name: postgresql_password
property.description: Password matching the username to authenticate with when connecting to the database

property.name: postgresql_options
property.description: Database options to send to the server when connecting.

property.name: oracle_engine
property.description: Oracle Database backend to use

property.name: oracle_nice_name
property.description: Name to show in the UI.

property.name: oracle_name
property.description: For Oracle, name is the name of the database

property.name: oracle_host
property.description: IP or hostname of the database to connect to

property.name: oracle_port
property.description: Port the database server is listening to

property.name: oracle_user
property.description: Password matching the username to authenticate with when connecting to the database

property.name: oracle_password
property.description: Password matching the username to authenticate with when connecting to the database

property.name: oracle_options
property.description: Database options to send to the server when connecting.
